title: WHAT DID THE H.K. POLICE DO TO OUR KIDS

replies.msg:
H.K. POLICE ATTACKED AND KILLED OUR KIDS

THEY RAPED OUR DAUGHTERS AND SONS

THEY DID ANYTHING THEY LIKE TO OUR KIDS

AND TRIED TO COVER THEIR MALEFICENCE

BY INTIMIDATING, BEATING UP,

OR EVEN KILLING AND THROWING THEM TO THE SEA

IF THE VICTIMS' FAMILIES INVESTIGATED INTO THEIR KIDS' DEATHS,

THE POLICE WOULD JUST DO THE SAME THINGS TO THEIR FAMILIES



FIGHT FOR FREEDOM, STAND WITH H.K.

FIVE DEMANDS, NOT ONE LESS
1. Completely withdraw Extradition Bill.
2. Retract the proclamation that protests on 9th June and 12th June were riots
3. Withdraw criminal charges against all protesters
4. Thoroughly investigate abuse of powers by the police.
5. Dissolve the Legislative Council by administrative order, and immediately implement Dual Universal Suffrage.


DIU MY ENGLISH IS FUCKING POOR

PLEASE FORGIVE ME IF THERE IS ANY MISTAKE LA, THX
